    # Typescript

    # keyof

    è¯¥æ“ä½œç¬¦å¯ä»¥ç”¨äºè·å–æŸç§ç±»å‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰é”®ï¼Œå…¶è¿”å›ç±»å‹æ˜¯è”åˆç±»å‹ã€‚

    function get<T extends object, K extends keyof T>(o: T, name: K): T[K] {
  return o[name]
}

interface Person {
  name: string;
  age: number;
  location: string;
}

type K1 = keyof Person; // "name" | "age" | "location"
type K2 = keyof Person[];  // number | "length" | "push" | "concat" | ...
type K3 = keyof { [x: string]: Person };  // string | number

    # Required & Partial & Pick

    partial: æå–éƒ¨åˆ†
    pick: æŒ‰ key æå–

    interface User {
  id: number;
  age: number;
  name: string;
}

// ç›¸å½“äº: type PartialUser = { id?: number; age?: number; name?: string; }
type PartialUser = Partial<User>;

// ç›¸å½“äº: type PickUser = { id: number; age: number; }
type PickUser = Pick<User, "id" | "age">;

    # åˆ†æƒ…å†µè®¨è®º

    type isTrue<T> = T extends true ? true : false

// ç›¸å½“äº type t = false
type t = isTrue<number>

// ç›¸å½“äº type t = false
type t = isTrue<false>

    const [state,setState]=useState<typeof initial>(initial)

    # infer

    é€šè¿‡æ¨¡å¼åŒ¹é…è·å–ç‰¹å®šéƒ¨åˆ†çš„ç±»å‹

    type Last<Arr extends unknown[]> = Arr extends [...infer rest, infer Ele]
  ? Ele
  : never;

type res = Last<[1, 2, 3]>;
//type res =3

    type GetReturnType<Func extends Function> = Func extends (
  ...args: any[]
) => infer ReturnType
  ? ReturnType
  : never;

    TS 4.7 å¼•å…¥ infer extends çº¦æŸæ¨å¯¼çš„ç±»å‹
